attributes.action: cut tax on petrol as this governement takes more tax than any where else in Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It's about time the petrol duties were cut or even better abolished. We pay VAT to purchase a car, tax on our insurance, road fund tax and crazy amounts on the fuel we use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
